00007 class Conversions

00009 public:
00010         static double Str2Armor(char *buf, DWORD *specialFX) {
00011                 if(!buf) { return 0.0; }
00012                 if(strchr(buf, '%')) {
00013                         bool specialed = false;
00014                         if(strlen(buf) == 2) {
00015                                 switch(*buf) {
00016                                         case '0':
00017                                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_ForceFire;
00018                                         case '1':
00019                                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_Retaliate;
00020                                         case '2':
00021                                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_PassiveAcquire;
00022                                                 specialed = true;
00023                                                 break;
00024                                 }
00025                         }
00026                         if(!specialed) {
00027                                 *specialFX |= verses_ForceFire;
00028                                 *specialFX |= verses_Retaliate;
00029                                 *specialFX |= verses_PassiveAcquire;
00030                         }
00031                         return atoi(buf) * 0.01;
00032                 } else {
00033                         double vs = atof(buf);
00034                         bool specialed = false;
00035                         if(CLOSE_ENOUGH(vs, 0.02)) {
00036                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_PassiveAcquire;
00037                                 specialed = true;
00038                         }
00039                         if(CLOSE_ENOUGH(vs, 0.01)) {
00040                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_Retaliate;
00041                         }
00042                         if(CLOSE_ENOUGH(vs, 0.00)) {
00043                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_ForceFire;
00044                         }
00045                         if(!specialed) {
00046                                 *specialFX |= verses_ForceFire;
00047                                 *specialFX |= verses_Retaliate;
00048                                 *specialFX |= verses_PassiveAcquire;
00049                         }
00050                         return vs;
00051                 }
00052         }
00053 
00054         // OMG OPTIMIZED:
00055         // http://graphics.stanford.edu/~seander/bithacks.html#IntegerLog
00056         static int Int2Highest(DWORD v) {
00057                 register unsigned int r; // result of log2(v) will go here
00058                 register unsigned int shift;
00059 
00060                 r =     (v > 0xFFFF) << 4; v >>= r;
00061                 shift = (v > 0xFF  ) << 3; v >>= shift; r |= shift;
00062                 shift = (v > 0xF   ) << 2; v >>= shift; r |= shift;
00063                 shift = (v > 0x3   ) << 1; v >>= shift; r |= shift;
00064                                                         r |= (v >> 1);
00065 
00066                 return r;
00067         }
00068 
00069 };
